title: Carcinoma of the esophagus: fluroscopic observations of adva
creator_credit: Norman Schenker and Medical Audio-Visual Institute
brief_description: Illustrating device as an aid to live lectures; shows, by means of cinefluorography, various irregularities of the oesophageal wall created by carcinomas.
